programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi takes on a powerful judge when he inexplicably dismisses the rape case of a university student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson teams up with Lt. Barek and the Bronx SVU to track down a serial rapist with victims in both boroughs.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson helps two sisters get closure from a harrowing childhood assault; Kat's cousin reaches out for help.

programme.title: Resident Alien

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad rallies around Det. Stabler to find the suspect behind a threat to his family.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU must contend with an angry neighborhood watch group when a girl goes missing near a building that houses several sex offenders.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Investigators didn't know if Kathy Heckel was a missing person or murder victim; decades later the case is reopened by a new detective.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: The murder of a young schoolteacher in Pennsylvania goes unsolved for years, but investigators discover a new tool that may finally help unlock the murderer's identity.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A man from Iowa is shot to death while sleeping in bed next to his fiancee; coincidences and quick thinking lead to surprising information regarding the killer's motive.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A man from Iowa is shot to death while sleeping in bed next to his fiancee; coincidences and quick thinking lead to surprising information regarding the killer's motive.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The NCIS team works with Hetty's former Vietnam War colleagues, A.J. Chegwidden, Sterling Bridges and Charles Langston, on a gold heist investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Sam's wife, Michelle, is taken from her home, the kidnappers demand that Sam's arch nemesis, Tahir Khaled, be released from prison in exchange for Michelle's whereabouts.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam Hanna goes rogue from the NCIS team in an attempt to stop Tahir Khaled from ever targeting his family again.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team searches for a serial killer who justifies his crimes with paranoid religious motivation. Richard Thomas and Karen Allen guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An estranged son and a former patient are the prime suspects in the murder of a prominent doctor and the rape of his wife.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler pairs with a bitter cop (David Keith) to track a serial rapist/murderer who was recently released from prison.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape/murder of a woman whose stepfather is a judge (Keir Dullea) known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate two rapes that appear to have been committed by the same man; Mary Beth Hurt and Henry Winkler guest star.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ex-convict who sexually assaulted prostitutes appears to have been killed by a would-be victim, then another homicide suggests the woman may be a manipulative serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a corporate mogul is found murdered, evidence points to his son, whom the detectives suspect was seduced by his stepmother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for the sadist who tortured a senile old woman (Jane Powell), investigating her nursing home, as well as her scheming son (Jay Thomas).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad spends New Year's Eve tracking down an Amber Alert, and Carisi faces off against counselor Rafael Barba in an emotional courtroom battle.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A high-profile activist suspects her sister has been kidnapped by a hate group; Garland and Benson push for change with NYPD brass; Kat gets some good news.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant; Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU searches for three women suspected of drugging and robbing wealthy men; the case leads to personal connections for both Benson and Kat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to investigate an unusual domestic violence case when his neighbor is found injured.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While Fin and Phoebe make wedding plans, Benson and Rollins try to help a homeless single mother who's being trafficked in exchange for safe housing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As the investigation into a sex-for-housing scheme expands, Benson's loyalty to Garland is tested; Rollins and Carisi try to keep their witnesses on board when a powerful congressman is identified as a suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team investigates a string of brutal pharmacy robberies, and Halstead connects with one of the victims about their Army careers; Upton suspects there is more to the story and confides in Voight.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A murder pulls rookie officer Dante Torres into his own neighborhood; as Voight and Atwater help him navigate the case and manage tricky personal dynamics with wary neighbors, Torres realizes his life may be forever changed.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Upton's dogged pursuit of a missing teenage girl leads the team into a dark web of human trafficking; chief O'Neal becomes involved with the unit's investigation when it becomes evident his son, Sean, has a connection to the missing girl.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Atwater's reactions during a tense arrest are called into question; the team must dig in to uncover key evidence that could aid in the ongoing investigation and clear Atwater's name.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When actionable evidence finally surfaces against Sean O'Neal, Upton and the team work relentlessly to build a case in secret; they discover Sean is more elusive and dangerous than anticipated.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: To distract Intelligence from the investigation into his son, Chief O'Neal forces the team to handle a "dead fish" case; when that dead fish turns into a complicated heater case, Burgess is thrown back into difficult memories from her past.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a shocking discovery, the team begins closing in on Sean O'Neal with every shred of evidence they can find; determined to keep his son out of prison, Chief O'Neal hires a lawyer.
